titleStmt.title: A discourse of the married and single life Wherein, by discovering the misery of the one, is plainely declared the felicity of the other.
titleStmt.author: Jardin, Roland du.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted [by F. Kingston] for Ionas Man,

notesStmt.note: Translated or adapted, at least in part, from R. Du Jardin's "Lettre du philosophe Lyndorach au roy Culteber"--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
